column1: 1922|7:22|Gripping her gym bag in her right hand
column4: was waiting for something to happen. The clock display changed to 7:21

column1: 1922|7:22 p.m.|It was 7:22 p.m. by the wall clock when he soldered the final connection. Eric estimated a half hour delay before the little generator had taken over
column2: put the time actually at near eight o'clock. He found himself hesitant
column3: strangely unwilling to test the completed machine.
